languages.text: Расчет Лорд-капитана оказался верен — после основательных (как и все, чем руководит Седая Маттина) поисков разведчики обнаружили неповрежденные компоненты и разметили их для последующего демонтажа.

The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.
languages.original_text: Расчет Лорд-капитана оказался верен — после основательных (как и все, чем руководит Седая Маттина) поисков разведчики обнаружили неповрежденные компоненты и разметили их для последующего демонтажа.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Gray Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Gray Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Gray Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

languages.text: La evaluación de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} resultó ser correcta: tras una búsqueda concienzuda (como todas las lideradas por Mattina la Gris), los exploradores encontraron componentes intactos y los marcaron para su posterior desmontado.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: La evaluación de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} resultó ser correcta: tras una búsqueda concienzuda (como todas las lideradas por Mattina la Gris), los exploradores encontraron componentes intactos y los marcaron para su posterior desmontado.

languages.text: 事实证明，舰长大人的判断非常准确。经过一番细致的探索（正如“灰马”一直以来所做的那样），侦察兵发现了尚未损坏的部件，并在上面做了标记，为之后的拆解做好了准备。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: 事实证明，舰长大人的判断非常准确。经过一番细致的探索（正如“灰马”一直以来所做的那样），侦察兵发现了尚未损坏的部件，并在上面做了标记，为之后的拆解做好了准备。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの見立ては正しかったと分かる。徹底的な捜索の結果（グレイ・マティナが行ったすべての捜索と同じく）、偵察兵は傷ひとつない部品を発見して、後で解体するためにマークを付けた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの見立ては正しかったと分かる。徹底的な捜索の結果（グレイ・マティナが行ったすべての捜索と同じく）、偵察兵は傷ひとつない部品を発見して、後で解体するためにマークを付けた。

languages.text: Die Einschätzung des Lord Captain erwies sich als korrekt – nach einer gründlichen Durchsuchung (was bei der Grauen Mattina immer der Fall war) fanden die Späher unbeschädigte Komponenten und markierten sie zur späteren Demontage.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: Die Einschätzung des Lord Captain erwies sich als korrekt – nach einer gründlichen Durchsuchung (was bei der Grauen Mattina immer der Fall war) fanden die Späher unbeschädigte Komponenten und markierten sie zur späteren Demontage.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} avait vu juste : après une fouille minutieuse (comme toutes celles menées par Mattina), les éclaireurs trouvèrent des composants intacts et les marquèrent pour un démantèlement ultérieur.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} avait vu juste : après une fouille minutieuse (comme toutes celles menées par Mattina), les éclaireurs trouvèrent des composants intacts et les marquèrent pour un démantèlement ultérieur.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın değerlendirmesi haklı çıkmıştı. Gri Mattina, tüm araştırmalarında olduğu gibi bunda da oldukça titiz davrandı. Detaylı araştırma sonucunda keşif erleri, el değmemiş malzemeler bulup parçalara ayrılmaları için bunları işaretledi.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's assessment proved to be correct — after a thorough search (as all searches conducted by Grey Mattina were), the scouts found undamaged components and marked them for later dismantling.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan'ın değerlendirmesi haklı çıktı. Gri Mattina, tüm araştırmalarında olduğu gibi bunda da oldukça titiz davrandı. Detaylı araştırma sonucunda keşif birliği, el değmemiş malzemeler buldu ve parçalarına ayrılmak üzere işaretledi.
